Member Function Documentation

CSwordKey* CSwordKey::createInstance (  CSwordModuleInfo *    module )  [static]
 

This returns a new object of the right CSwordKey* implementation (e.g.

CSwordVerseKey or CSwordLDKey) The type is determined by the type of the module.

See also:
CSwordModuleInfo, CSwordBibleModuleInfo, CSwordCommentaryModuleInfo, CSwordLexiconModukleInfo
